Boss preppers (permalink) Sometimes, you learn a fact that makes everything else make sense – one of those keystone insights that puts a whole phenomenon into perspective. For example, the fact that preppers are engaged in a very specific type of wish-fulfillment. I learned this during the first part of the pandemic lockdowns, when preppers were very much in our collective consciousness.
